E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 8/2/1991
Subject: F.P. Santangelo learns new position
F.P. Santangelo has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 8/11/1991
Subject: Progress of F.P. Santangelo
Dear Sir,
F.P. Santangelo has nothing more to prove at AA Albany-Colonie Yankees!
He has an AVG of .301 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 8/16/1991
Subject: Progress of Pep Harris
Dear Sir,
Pep Harris has an ERA of 3.27 at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 8/20/1991
Subject: Doug Johns healing process
Doug Johns is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
